definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: In colonial days in America, children rolled hoops along the streets, guiding them with sticks.
sentences.chinese: 在殖民時代的美國，孩子們沿街用木棍引導滾圈玩耍。

sentences.english: The woman always takes a radiogram and leans on stick.
sentences.chinese: 這個女人總是拿着一臺收音機，拄着木棍。

sentences.english: Her father used often to hunt them in out of the field with his blackthorn stick; … : Her father often came to drive them home from the field using his blackthorn stick;
sentences.chinese: 他父親常用那根黑刺李木棍把他們從空地往家趕。

sentences.english: They threw eggs, sticks, bottles and a fire extinguisher at the police.
sentences.chinese: 他們向警察投擲了雞蛋，木棍，酒瓶和一些滅火器。

sentences.english: The captain saw a floating stick and they rowed to it.
sentences.chinese: 船長髮現海面上漂著一根木棍，他們把船劃了過去。

sentences.english: They make fire by rubbing two sticks together.
sentences.chinese: 他們靠摩擦兩根木棍取火。

sentences.english: He used a stick blackened in the fire to write because he couldn't even afford a pencil!
sentences.chinese: 因爲他連鉛筆都買不起，他只能用燒黑的木棍寫字。

sentences.english: They brought them back home and tied them with a piece of string into the shape of a cross.
sentences.chinese: 他們把木棍帶回家，用一根繩子把它們綁成十字形。

sentences.english: We first trenching , to a long and solid wooden sticks into each pit.
sentences.chinese: 我們先挖坑，把一根長而結實的木棍插入每個坑內。

sentences.english: One end of the stick tapers down to a point.
sentences.chinese: 木棍的一頭漸漸變細成一個尖頭。

sentences.english: Her father often came to drive them home from the field using his blackthorn stick;
sentences.chinese: 他父親常用那根黑刺李木棍把他們從空地往家趕。

sentences.english: Check the wooden stick to ( ) ( )that it hasn't broken.
sentences.chinese: 檢查一下那隻木棍，確認沒有斷成兩截。

sentences.english: Don't whittle the stick into a short one.
Three men with clubs were helping him to scatter them.
sentences.chinese: 另外三個人拿着木棍幫着他驅散它們。

sentences.english: Dongpo and less swim take a stick to beat the snake, but only to find belt.
sentences.chinese: 東坡和少遊等人拿着木棍欲打蛇，卻只找到腰帶。
